String.string:
Use Personal Teleport Scroll: Olivung.

[Press key to open inventory and right-click Personal Teleport Scroll: Olivung to use.]
Island of Dawn â€” Southern Checkpoint
The cooking aroma is giving you an appetite.
Approach Olivung at the Southern Checkpoint.
Speak with Olivung at the Southern Checkpoint.
Obtain a Brutal Bloodbound Teralith's Core and deliver it to Olivung.
Try the Bloodbound Salad. [Press key to open your inventory, and select the Bloodbound Salad.]
Obtain the first piece of the Aspiration Stone.
Speak with Olivung at the Southern Checkpoint.
Use the first piece of the Aspiration Stone to empower the Eternal Crown. [Press key to open your inventory, and select the Aspiration Stone - First Piece.]
Speak with Olivung at the Southern Checkpoint.
